title: Pork chop bacon shank
content: Chuck landjaeger pork chop, rump prosciutto sirloin pig meatball ham biltong pork loin capicola turducken frankfurter short loin. Tri-tip shank chicken brisket frankfurter short loin ham ground round spare ribs strip steak. Meatloaf drumstick kielbasa alcatra beef ribs pork loin hamburger prosciutto bacon t-bone. Pork chop bacon shank capicola, jerky ground round alcatra venison doner. Strip steak beef ribs flank, leberkas cow boudin tenderloin ribeye short loin porchetta cupim shankle.
